title: Donald Trump posts AI video depicting Barack and Michelle Obama as monkeys; Democrats condemn post as racist
summary_full: US President Donald Trump ignited controversy by sharing a video on Truth Social featuring false election claims and depicting the Obamas with offensive imagery. Democrats swiftly condemned the post, with California Governor Newsom's office calling it "disgusting." This incident follows a pattern of Trump using fabricated visuals to attack critics and promote himself.
